page.title: 19Caversham and Sonning Guides
page.content: There are millions of Guides and Brownies all over Britain and about a thousand of them in the Caversham Park, Emmer Green and Sonning area.The Guide uniform is a navy blue skirt, a guide blue (pale) blouse, a blue hat and a neckerchief. Each company wears different coloured ties. Caversham wear red,Emmer Green orange.Caversham Park Guides, which started in 1979, hold their meetings in Caversham Park Primary School hall or outside in the summer. Activities are held and games are played. This year Guides and Brownies are going to Newbury, to celebrate the{75th Anniversary of {Guiding.}There are going to be things to do e.g.ride on dodgems and ghost trains. Each pack is going to make a cake and bring it to Newbury to make one big cake.
